General.Name: LB Group Co Ltd
General.Description: LB Group Co., Ltd., an inorganic fine chemical company, manufactures and sells titanium dioxide pigments worldwide. The company offers sponge titanium, zirconium, sulfuric acid, titanium dioxide, and mineral products for use in indoor and outdoor paints, inks, plastics, paper, electronics, rubber, fibers, ceramics, enamels, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and sunscreen product applications. It provides its products under the LOMON and BILLIONS brand names. The company was formerly known as Lomon Billions Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LB Group Co., Ltd. in July 2021. LB Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jiaozuo, China.

5.Name: Mr. Xinlu  Jin
5.Title: Director of Legal & Member of the Supervisory Board
